name: Sideways Eight Parachuting (One Hour Game Jam 76)
name_original: Sideways Eight Parachuting (One Hour Game Jam 76)
description:
You're parachuting. Be careful to not hit any birds on the way down!

This is a little arcade parachuting game and made in a hour using Pico-8, for the 76th One Hour Game Jam. If you're interested in how it works, the source code is available.

The theme for this One Hour Game Jam was 'fall'n'avoid'.

Instructions

  • Move yourself left and right with the arrow keys.
  • Dodge the birds as you fall.
  • Try to get the highest score possible!
